root.name: Showdown: Legends of Wrestling
root.description: Released in 2004 Showdown: Legends of Wrestling was part of the Legends of Wrestling series published by Acclaim Entertainment. It came out on the Playstation 2 and XBOX.The game featured virtually all the wrestlers in Legends of Wrestling II and also had a new batch for you to control.The new wrestlers featured:The Ultimate WarriorRick RudeMr PerfectStingDusty RhodesJake Roberts Nikita KoloffDiamond Dallas PageRandy SavageGame Modes:Showdown ChallengeQuick PlayMatch PlayCreate a LegendMatch Types:Singles 1 vs 1Hardcore 1 vs 1Tag Team 2 vs 2, 3 vs 3, 4 vs 4, 3 way, 4 way30 min Ironman MatchFirst Blood2 out of 3 falls1 on 1 Tournament (up to 16 players)Tag Team Tournament (up to 8 teams)3 way dance (3 person elimination match)4 way dance (4 person elimination match)Battle RoyalCage matchLadder matchTable matchThe Showdown Challenge mode allows you to fight your way through the 70's, 80's and 90's eras of wrestling where you face superstars from those specific periods.Â Your ultimate goal in this mode is to become the Showdown Champion.
